original_text: When anyone bent his body down low to give honour to Absalom, Absalom would reach out and pull the man towards him. He would kiss the man.
korean_text: 사람이 가까이 와서 그에게 절하려 하면 압살롬이 손을 펴서 그 사람을 붙들고 그에게 입을 맞추니

sentences.original_text: When anyone bent his body down low
and pull the man towards him
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그 남자를 자기에게로 끌어당길 것이었습니다
